page.title: 01Gazeteer of Brafferton area
page.content: { Brafferton}is a small village lying 6 kilometres north of{Darlington.}The area around the village is extremely rural away from the main road and many of the farms are surprisingly isolated. Almost all the activity in the area is{farming}although a section of the residents commute to work to nearby {Newton Aycliffe}or to Darlington. The area divides East-West neatly into half with the East containing the residential areas of Brafferton, {Coatham Mundeville}and the ribbon housing development around{High {Beaumont Hill.}It also includes the main communications in the area running North-South i.e. the motorway, the A167 and the main line railway. The Western half is composed of scattered farms,tracks and numerous becks flowing into the river Skerne.
